65#define UX_INIT() nbgl_objInit();
66
67#ifdef HAVE_BOLOS
68// to be used only by hal_io.c in BOLOS, for compatibility
69#define UX_FORWARD_EVENT_REDRAWCB(bypasspincheck, \
70 ux_params, \
71 ux, \
72 os_ux, \
73 os_sched_last_status, \
74 callback, \
75 redraw_cb, \
76 ignoring_app_if_ux_busy) \
77 ux_params.ux_id = BOLOS_UX_EVENT; \
78 ux_params.len = 0; \
79 os_ux(&ux_params); \
80 ux_params.len = os_sched_last_status(TASK_BOLOS_UX); \
81 if (ux.asynchmodal_end_callback \
82 && os_ux_get_status(BOLOS_UX_ASYNCHMODAL_PAIRING_REQUEST) != 0) { \
83 asynchmodal_end_callback_t cb = ux.asynchmodal_end_callback; \
84 ux.asynchmodal_end_callback = NULL; \
85 cb(os_ux_get_status(BOLOS_UX_ASYNCHMODAL_PAIRING_REQUEST)); \
86 }
87#endif // HAVE_BOLOS
88
94#define UX_WAKE_UP() \
95 G_ux_params.ux_id = BOLOS_UX_WAKE_UP; \
96 G_ux_params.len = 0; \
97 os_ux(&G_ux_params); \
98 G_ux_params.len = os_sched_last_status(TASK_BOLOS_UX);
99

110#define UX_TICKER_EVENT(seph_packet, callback) ux_process_ticker_event()
